Insurance

Class BuildingPolicy

  • java.lang.Object
    • Insurance.Policy
      • Insurance.BuildingPolicy

  • public class BuildingPolicy
extends Policy
    Ashley Moore -18/02/2013 A class that inherits the policy class to create a building policy object
     

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class Insurance.Policy

    • Constructor Detail

      • BuildingPolicy

        public BuildingPolicy(int polYear,
              java.lang.String polNum,
              double reBuildCost,
              double risk)
               throws IllegalPolicyException
        Default building policy constructor which takes four parameters, it sets the object's fields to the given parameters
        Parameters:
        polYear - the year when the policy was taken out
        polNum - the policy id number
        reBuildCost - cost to rebuild the insured building
        risk - double between 0-1 risk factor
        Throws:
        IllegalPolicyException - exception error
